roles.title: Commander in Chief
quotes: the Commander in Chief went to see me one day and said:
I had to be able to knock on the door of every house in Chile and say:
Augusto Pinochet was dictator of Chile between 1973 and 1990.

issues.description: Missing organization information for the career position.
The role 'dictator of Chile' might be better classified as a political position rather than a standard career position, but it is not clearly misclassified.
